tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalaryData (
  employee_id INT,
  current_salary DECIMAL,
  target_salary DECIMAL,
  years_of_experience INT,
  industry VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE job_transitions (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    previous_job_title VARCHAR,
    new_job_title VARCHAR,
    previous_salary FLOAT,
    new_salary FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE salary_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    current_salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    last_promotion_date DATE,
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE job_transitions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transition_date DATE,
    previous_job_title VARCHAR(50),
    new_job_title VARCHAR(50),
    salary_increase DECIMAL(10, 2),
    employee_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES salary_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE negotiation_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    negotiation_date DATE,
    negotiation_type VARCHAR(50),
    negotiation_outcome VARCHAR(50),
    negotiated_by VARCHAR(50),
    employee_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES salary_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE job_history (
    job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT REFERENCES employee(employee_id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    previous_job_title VARCHAR(255),
    previous_salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE compensation_data (
    compensation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT REFERENCES employee(employee_id),
    date_reported DATE,
    reported_salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    negotiation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE job_comparisons (
    comparison_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT REFERENCES employee(employee_id),
    comparison_date DATE,
    potential_job VARCHAR(255),
    potential_salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    negotiation_outcome VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE salary_data ( 
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  current_salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
  job_title TEXT, 
  years_of_experience INTEGER 
 );

CREATE TABLE job_transitions ( 
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  employee_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
  previous_job_title TEXT, 
  new_job_title TEXT, 
  new_salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL 
 );

CREATE TABLE negotiation_history ( 
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  employee_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
  negotiation_date DATE, 
  negotiated_salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
  negotiation_notes TEXT 
 );

CREATE TABLE job_offer ( 
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  job_title TEXT, 
  offered_salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
  offer_date DATE, 
  offer_expiry_date DATE 
 );

CREATE TABLE salary_comparison ( 
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
 employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
 current_salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
 comparison_job_title TEXT, 
 comparison_salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL 
 );
